sentence.Network_en: When the government policies are expressed imprecisely, confusion results.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府政策的措辞含混不清就会产生混乱.

sentence.Network_en: They are an imprecisely defined group of shrubs and small trees found in the Southeast.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是些见于美国东南部地区的灌木和小乔木.

sentence.Network_en: Sometimes the term is used ( imprecisely ) to include settlement.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时该术语包含结算 ( 不严密地 ).
